title: New: Lana Del Rey – Never Let Me Go
content:
It’s been a while since we last heard from everyone’s favourite pouty-lipped princess, and it appears she may have been working on new material in that time.

This delightful new ballad titled Never Let Me Go feels far more like her original demos than the tracks which formed her debut album Born To Die. It’s all 60’s guitars, violin swoons and tinkling pianos, enough to win over even the most ardent Del Rey hater. Lyrically it’s stereotypical Lana, quoting Scarface and harking on about ‘bad boys’ and living fast/dying young, but hey, you know the score by now right?

Kudos to Disco Naivete for the heads up.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
